|brand = Pine64 |model = PINE A64 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = + |revision = (2GB) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = April 9, 2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/PINE_A64%2B_2GB |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;A64; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G0846E; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 02:BA:AE
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2014.07;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Micro SD card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 1.4, Audio in/out (3.5mm), RTC w/ battery backup, |addchip = PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP803;;1;,,, Ultra Low Capacitance TVS Array;SemTech;RClamp0524P;;2;,,, 300mA Dual-Channel Ultra Low Drop Out Voltage Regulator;TI;LP3986;;1;,,, White LED 3A Current Limit Step-Up Converter;Silicon Standard;SS6635;;1;,,, 30V 1A High Performance Boost Converter;LowPower Semi;LP3315;;1;,,, 1.5A Power Switch w/ Programmable Current Limit;LowPower Semi;LPW5210;;2; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Armbian, Debian, Win10 (IoT)
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2016 |estprice = 29 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01MRZFYQO |asin_country = GB |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Designed in Silicon Valley, California. Built in Silicon Delta, China." :is silkscreened on back of board. "A64-DB-2G-Rev B" and "2016-03-21" is silkscreened on board.
{{see also|List of SBCs}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Allwinner]] A64 @1.152GHz :Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A53) *GPU: ''Mali-400MP2'' (H.265/HEVC 4K) *Storage: TF card (max. 128GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 2GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE LAN port *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power Source: 5V/2A via USB Micro-B
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.pine64.org/wiki/PINE_A64 Documentation] *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pine64 ''Pine64'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Pine64 ''Pine64'' on '''SunXi'''] So far there are three different models: :PINE A64 (512MB DRAM) :PINE A64+ (1GB DRAM) :PINE A64+ (2GB DRAM) *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2015/12/09/pine-a64-development-board-kickstarter-campaign-is-up/ ''PINE A64 Development Board Kickstarter Campaign'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2016/05/31/pine-a64-board-quick-start-guide-benchmarks-with-android-5-1/ ''Pine A64 Board Quick Start Guide & Benchmarks with Android 5.1'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/15-dollar-sbc-features-quad-core-64-bit-allwinner-a4-pi-expansion/ ''$15 SBC features quad-core 64-bit Allwinner A64 SoC'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/pine64/pine64_a64 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/pine64/pine_a64plus |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = sunxi |subtarget = cortexa53 |arch = aarch64_cortex-a53 |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==See also== *[[PINE A64+ 2GB]] • [http://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/PINE_A64_Main_Page MPage] *[[PINE A64-LTS]] • [http://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/PINE_A64-LTS/SOPine_Main_Page MPage] *[[PINE H64]] • [http://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/PINE_H64_Main_Page MPage] *[[PINE ROCK64]] • [http://wiki.pine64.org/index.php/ROCK64_Main_Page MPage]
